response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I am confident that its potential and benefits could significantly impact your endeavors. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this exceptional item to you at a price of $950,000. This is a generous offer, considering the intrinsic worth of the product, and I believe it presents a compelling investment opportunity for you. Should you be interested in discussing this further, please let me know, and we can arrange a time to explore the details and ensure that all your questions are answered.", "product_price": 950000}
